DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double-blind , placebo control , two period crossover study investigate pharmacokinetics , tolerability cognitive effect 8 day dose CNV1014802 healthy young versus elderly male female subject . Treatment period separate 13 day . The primary outcome measure pharmacokinetics ( PK ) tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: PK & Tolerability CNV1014802 Young Elderly Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Key Healthy male female 18 year use acceptable method contraception Key Positive prestudy HIV , Hepatitis B surface antigen positive Hepatitis C antibody History evidence alcohol drug abuse Pregnant lactating female Participation clinical trial within 3 month current study exposure four new chemical entity within 12 month . Use prohibit concomitant medication History presence clinically significant abnormality vital sign / ECG / laboratory test , medical psychiatric condition , , opinion Investigator may interfere study procedure compromise subject safety . Relevant history suicide attempt suicidal behavior
